"""Scale a sequential colormap."""
lut_table_new = lut_table.copy()
n_colors = lut_table.shape[0]
n_colors2 = n_colors // 2
fmid_idx = int(np.round(n_colors * ((fmid - fmin) / (fmax - fmin))) - 1)
for i in range(4):
    part1 = np.interp(np.linspace(0, n_colors2 - 1, fmid_idx + 1), np.
        arange(n_colors), lut_table[:, (i)])
    lut_table_new[:fmid_idx + 1, (i)] = part1
    part2 = np.interp(np.linspace(n_colors2, n_colors - 1, n_colors -
        fmid_idx - 1), np.arange(n_colors), lut_table[:, (i)])
    lut_table_new[fmid_idx + 1:, (i)] = part2
return lut_table_new
